data

Class SharedData

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.SharedData

  • public class SharedData
extends java.lang.Object
    The SharedData class provides a thread-safe container for storing shared data among different components. It encapsulates variables representing color threshold, motor A value, and motor B value.
